@graph.name: Stops Bundling - Intelligent Route Destination Grouping for Fleet Management - Route4Me
@graph.description: Automatically group multiple destinations at the same address or geographic region. Customize bundling rules for service times while maintaining individual stop tracking for signatures, photos, and scanning.
@graph.keywords: route optimization, stops bundling, location grouping, destination bundling, multiple stops, route efficiency, geographic proximity, service time optimization, fleet management, delivery optimization, bundling rules, route planning, location clustering, delivery logistics

@graph.name: Stops Bundling for Route Optimization
@graph.description: Our route optimization technology automatically combines route destinations that are in the same geographic region into a single bundled location. The bundled destination aggregates all sub-destination details like weight, cube, pieces, cost, revenue, and service time. Each original stop remains accessible as a sub-item, allowing team members to individually capture signatures, photos, scan labels at each destination. ETAs, automatic alerts, and other platform capabilities continue to work seamlessly. You can customize bundling rules to maintain high route optimization quality, with flexible options for handling service times based on your specific business needs.

@graph.name: Request Stops Bundling Implementation
@graph.description: Contact our team to discuss implementing Stops Bundling for your organization's route optimization needs

@graph.name: Bundling Customization
@graph.value: Flexible geographic proximity settings, configurable service time rules, customizable bundling parameters

@graph.name: Core Functionality
@graph.value: Automatic destination bundling, sub-destination tracking, service time aggregation, individual stop activity tracking

@graph.name: Platform Integration
@graph.value: Seamless integration with Route4Me platform, works with ETAs, alerts, and other dynamic capabilities
